HTMLMediaElementSeekable.summary: The seekable read-only property of objects returns a new static normalized TimeRanges object that represents the ranges of the media resource, if any, that the user agent is able to seek to at the time seekable property is accessed.

remarks.para:
-: Interface used to define the HTMLMediaElement.seekable property
-Media Source API
-Media buffering, seeking, and time ranges

HTMLMediaElementSeekable.value: A new static normalized TimeRanges object that represents the ranges of the media resource, if any, that the user agent is able to seek to at the time seekable property is accessed.
